title: Lung cancer rising in young adults: Causes, symptoms and prevention tips

title: Aishwarya, Abhishek didn't comment on divorce speculations: Prahlad Kakkar
description: Even as there were divorce rumours, Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan maintained a dignified silence. The silently proved that they are together and remained unaffected by all the speculations. Now adman Prahlad Kakkar has opened up on their equation and steered clear on the rumours.

Hosted by King Charles III, Trump aims to strengthen transatlantic ties through discussions with Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer. The visit includes a "Tech Prosperity Deal" with significant US investments, but also faces protests and disagreements over foreign policy, particularly regarding the Ukraine conflict.

title: ‘Remember how I was engraving bullets?’: Kirk killer’s chilling texts to partner
description: Tyler Robinson is accused of killing conservative activist Charlie Kirk. Robinson reportedly confessed to his partner via text. The messages reveal planning and motive. Robinson worried about a rifle used in the shooting. The rifle was a family heirloom. Robinson's DNA was found on the weapon. He asked his partner to delete messages. Robinson was arrested after a standoff.

description: In Jaipur's Kardhani, Naveen Singh, 31, has been arrested for allegedly murdering his mother, Santosh, 52. A disturbing video captured Singh's brutal assault in the kitchen, even as his father, a Delhi Police constable, and sisters tried to intervene. The incident occurred after an argument over the internet connection and an empty LPG cylinder escalated, leading to the fatal attack.

title: Portable ion chromatograph brings real-world practice to classrooms
description: Aquamonitrix works as a simple, low-pressure ion chromatograph that can separate anions along a relatively short column. The solution used to carry the sample into the chromatograph and facilitate the exchange of anions with the column contains only sodium chloride, so the process is also environmentally friendly

Amidst heightened tensions and a complaint from the PCB regarding the match referee, the India-Pakistan match proceeded, with India winning. ITR filing due date missed? What happens next - penalties, late fees explained
description: The CBDT had extended the ITR filing deadline for individual taxpayers to September 16, 2025. Filing after this date incurs penalties, potentially up to Rs 5,000, and affects carry-forward benefits. Taxpayers opting for the old regime must file by the deadline to claim deductions like HRA and LTA, otherwise new regime is the default option.
